introduction: 雷素云1934年生人，2010年被确诊为阿尔茨海默症。雷素云的女儿照顾她，可雷素云不认识女儿。雷素云记不清很多事，她想回家，她不清楚她在哪，她老重复某一件事，她悲伤而惊恐。雷素云隐约记得她曾是很了不起的人，她是财政局局长，人大代表，人们都叫她老雷太太。可现在雷素云傻了，她哀叹时间，曾经的辉煌与过往都随着记忆烟消云散了。但雷素云依然知道自己的姓名，她与绝望抗争，力图抓住自我。年复一年，雷素云的病况越发严重，她躺在床上，看着虚无……Lei Suyun was born in 1934, and diagnosed with alzheimer's disease in 2010.Her daughter took care of her,but she didn’t know her daughter any more. She suffered from memory loss and  wanted to go home and didn’t know where she was.She repeated one thing all the time. She was sad and frightened.Lei Suyun vaguely remembered she was a great person,and she was the director of the bureau of finance, NPC member.  People used to call her Mrs Lei.Now Lei Suyun didn’t remember things, she lamented the passing of time.Her once brilliant achievements were gone with her memory. However,she still knew her name. She was struggling against despair,and trying to seize the self.Year after year, LeiSuYun’s condition was getting worse. she lay in bed, looking at nothing……
